nodes.text: Floog was a male Gozzo who ran a fuel refinery on the planet Drahgor III with the help of his nephews Flanx and Flix, as well as Flix's cousins Fleck, Flobb, and Fleez. Eventually, Flix left Drahgor III in the hopes of becoming a cantina singer, although his family had doubts about his abilities. By the year 34 ABY, Floog had retired and given control of the refinery to Flanx.
